dt: {bc}a hoisting apparatus employing a tackle rigged at the end of a beam
{bc}a framework or tower over a deep drill hole (as of an oil well) for supporting boring tackle or for hoisting and lowering

et: obsolete {it}derrick{/it} hangman, gallows, from {it}Derick{/it}, name of 17th century English hangman
shortdef: a hoisting apparatus employing a tackle rigged at the end of a beam
a framework or tower over a deep drill hole (as of an oil well) for supporting boring tackle or for hoisting and lowering
